detail_desc: Chinos in an airy cotton weave with a zip fly, side pockets, welt back pockets and tapered legs.
Cotton canvas trainers with lacing at the front. Canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Padded jacket with a detachable, padded hood, high collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Flap side pockets with a press-stud, ribbed cuffs and narrow elastication at the hem. Lined.
Kangol x H&M. Double-layered hat in a soft knit with a lightly brushed finish. Turn-up at the hem with the Kangol logo on the front.

Wide shirt in sturdy, organic cotton denim with a collar, press-studs down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.

Suit trousers in stretch fabric made from a wool blend woven in a special way to make it more crease-resistant. The trousers have a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly, diagonal side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button, and legs with creases. Slim fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Tights that provide support for the tummy, thighs and calves as well as encouraging circulation in the legs. Elasticated waist and extra space for a growing tummy. 30 denier.
Flared, calf-length skirt in sturdy satin with a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastener in one side. Unlined.
Blouse in a crêpe weave with short trumpet sleeves and a round hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Jumper in a soft jacquard knit containing some alpaca wool in a slightly wider fit with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Hooded jacket in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Chino shorts in washed cotton poplin with a zip fly, side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and legs with creases.

Lightly padded bomber jacket in woven fabric with a ribbed stand-up collar and detachable pile collar. Zip down the front, patch front pockets with a press-stud, a zipped sleeve pocket and a gathered seam at the back and down the sleeves. Appliqué on one sleeve and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a viscose blend with a supersoft, brushed finish. Long raglan dolman sleeves, ribbing around the neckline and short slits in the sides.
Jacket in washed, stretch cotton denim with sparkly-stone appliqués on the back. Collar, buttons down the front, fake chest pockets with a flap and press-stud, and buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Derby shoes in imitation leather with rounded toes, lacing at the top and a loop at the back. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Short-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with ribbing around the neckline, sleeves and hem.

Shirt in an airy cotton weave with a turn-down collar, open chest pocket and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with a tab and button and adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Lightweight running shorts in fast-drying functional fabric layered over a pair of short inner tights. Regular, elasticated drawstring waist with a key pocket in the waistband. The polyester content of the outer shorts is recycled.
Straight jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a stand-up collar, low dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves.
Small, soft shoulder bag in grained imitation leather with a narrow shoulder strap, flap with a magnetic press-stud and a fabric lining in a contrasting colour. Size 14.5x21 cm.

Blouse in airy, crinkled, patterned viscose with a V-neck, wrapover front with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener at the top and long, wide raglan sleeves with elastication at the cuffs. Wide panel at the hem that fastens with covered buttons at one side.
Sports vest top in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Jersey trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist, patch front pockets and elasticated hems.
Grained imitation leather card holder with two card compartments on one side, a compartment at the top and a compartment at the back. Closable with a tab and press-stud. Size 7x10 cm.
Round plastic earrings. Length 5.5 cm.

Shirt woven in a stretch cotton blend with a narrow turn-down collar, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, darts at the back, and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist to create a fitted silhouette.
Pull-on trousers in a textured linen and cotton weave. Adjustable elasticated waist with a decorative drawstring, zip fly and button, side pockets and jetted back pockets with a button.

Shorts in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a high, elasticated drawstring waist, pockets in the side seams and flap leg pockets with a tab and D-rings. The polyester content of the shorts is partly recycled.
Vest top in soft cotton jersey.
Wrapover bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with long sleeves and press-studs at the side and crotch.
Skinny-fit dungarees in washed, stretch denim with adjustable straps, a high waist, zip in one side, chest pocket, fake front pockets and real back pockets.

V-neck blouse in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Sewn-in wrapover front, a gathered, overlocked frill trim around the neckline and waist, and long puff sleeves with gathers to the cuffs. Seam at the waist with narrow, covered elastication and a gently flared peplum.
Patterned swim shorts with elastication and ties at the waist and a fly with a hook and loop fastening. Soft mesh inner shorts.

Lightly padded jacket in woven fabric with a detachable, fleece-lined hood with a faux fur trim. Diagonal zip down the front with a chin guard, a fake flap pocket on the tummy, and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Fleece lining.
Jacquard-knit tights with an elasticated waist. 20 denier.
Short, sleeveless dress in stretch lace with chiffon flower appliqués. The dress is in a circular cut with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Jersey lining.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with a button on one shoulder, long sleeves and roll edges around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jeggings in washed, superstretch denim with a high waist, fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs.
Jumper in soft, patterned, fine-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Hi-tops in canvas and imitation leather with grosgrain details. Padded tongue and top edge, a zip in one side, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and chunky soles.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with decorative buttons on the shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline and open chest pocket.

Ankle-length joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with a high, elasticated drawstring waist. Side pockets, flap leg pockets with a concealed press-stud, and tapered legs with covered elastication at the hems. Soft brushed inside.
V-neck dress in an airy weave with short, double-flounced sleeves, an elasticated seam at the waist and ties at the sides. Lined.
A-line skirt in twill made from a cotton blend with fake pockets and buttons at the front.
Loose-fitting blouse in woven fabric with a V-neck at the front and yoke at the back. Dropped shoulders, 3/4-length sleeves with pleats, a small opening and ties at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist.

Small, round bag in quilted imitation leather. Space for one bank card, a zip at the top and a carabiner hook at the back. Narrow, detachable shoulder strap. Lining in woven fabric made from recycled polyester. Diameter approx. 10 cm. Depth 1.5 cm.
Brazilian briefs in microfibre and lace with a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Thin metal rings in various sizes that can be worn on both the upper and lower part of the finger.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in woven fabric with lace down the front, elastication and a drawstring at the top and short sleeves.
Pyjamas in soft, patterned cotton jersey. Top with short, flounced sleeves. Shorts with an elasticated waist and gathered frills at the hems.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in airy cotton with broderie anglaise. Elastication and a wide flounce at the top.

Dress in soft, fine-knit cotton with a pointelle section at the front, long sleeves, buttons at the back and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Seam at the waist with a decorative bow and a flared skirt.
High-waisted jeans in stretch denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs.
Dress in soft cotton jersey with butterfly sleeves, gathers at the top, a gathered seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt.

Oversized jacket in washed cotton denim with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets, and a tab with adjustable buttoning at the sides of the hem. The cotton content of the jacket is partly recycled.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed denim with hard-worn details. Extra-high waist, a button fly and gently tapered legs with raw-edge hems.

Blouse in an airy weave with a stand-up collar and gathers at the top to create soft draping front and back. Opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck, long puff sleeves, cuffs with covered buttons, and a gently rounded hem.
Straight-cut top in an airy viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Lightly padded bomber jacket in satin with a ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Fully lined, patterned bikini. V-neck top with a decorative bow at the front, flounce-trimmed shoulder straps and a plastic fastener at the back. Matching bottoms.

Shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front, a small embroidered detail on the chest and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Contrasting colour in the inside of the collar and cuffs.
Fine-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Baby Exclusive. Trousers in soft, fine-knit cashmere with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Long-sleeved tops in soft organic cotton jersey.

Imitation suede espadrilles with a braided jute trim around the soles, lacing at the front and a heel strap at the back. Imitation leather linings, imitation suede insoles and fluted rubber soles. Platform 4 cm.
Top in airy linen jersey with short flounced sleeves and a deep V-neck with buttons at the top.
Shorts in Tencel™ lyocell twill with a high paper bag waist and detachable tie belt. Zip fly with a hook-and-eye fastening, side pockets with a decorative flap and fake back pockets.
Short, sleeveless dress in lace with a round neckline, concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastener at the back, and lining in a contrasting colour.
Sun hat in fast-drying, UV-protective, breathable, functional fabric with ties under the chin. Width of brim 5.5 cm. UPF 50.
Hairbands in elasticated cotton jersey. One with a sewn-on bow at the front and one with a decorative knot detail.
Cropped top in soft, printed cotton jersey with long sleeves.
V-neck tunic in woven fabric with a fastener at the top, wide, 3/4-length sleeves, slits in the sides and a rounded hem.
Short, boxy shirt jacket in cotton twill with a collar, buttons down the front and large chest pockets with a flap. Dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.

Suit trousers in woven fabric with an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button and legs with creases.

Hi-tops in shimmering holographic imitation leather with a glittery print. Padded top edge, a hook and loop tab at the top, elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Faux shearling linings and insoles. Transparent soles with motion-activated flashing LED lights in various colours. Height of soles 2.5 cm.
Dress in soft woven fabric with short frilled sleeves, a yoke and buttons at the back. Unlined.
Calf-length lace dress that can also be worn as a cardigan. V-neck, covered buttons down the front, short, wide sleeves, a seam with a lace band at the waist, and a scalloped hem. Unlined.
